scripts.install:dev: bun install && bun --cwd=packages/coding-agent link && bun --cwd=packages/ai link
scripts.check: biome check --write . && tsgo -p tsconfig.json && tsgo -p packages/stats/tsconfig.client.json
scripts.test: bun --cwd=packages/ai run test && bun --cwd=packages/agent run test && bun --cwd=packages/tui run test && bun --cwd=packages/coding-agent run test
scripts.version:patch: npm version patch -ws --no-git-tag-version && bun scripts/sync-versions.ts && rm -rf node_modules packages/*/node_modules bun.lock && bun install
scripts.version:minor: npm version minor -ws --no-git-tag-version && bun scripts/sync-versions.ts && rm -rf node_modules packages/*/node_modules bun.lock && bun install
scripts.version:major: npm version major -ws --no-git-tag-version && bun scripts/sync-versions.ts && rm -rf node_modules packages/*/node_modules bun.lock && bun install
scripts.publish: bun run prepublishOnly && npm publish -ws --access public
scripts.publish:dry: bun run prepublishOnly && npm publish -ws --access public --dry-run
